text: Gheorghe "Gigi" Mulțescu (; born 13 November 1951) is a Romanian professional football manager and a former football player. He won the Universiade gold medal with Romania's students football team in the 1974 edition that was held in France, playing alongside László Bölöni, Dan Păltinișanu, Romulus Chihaia and Paul Cazan. Mulțescu managed several clubs in Turkey, including Adanaspor, Gaziantepspor and Samsunspor. His son, Cătălin Mulțescu, was a goalkeeper, playing at various Liga I and Liga II clubs through his career. After he retired from the professional football career, he became a goalkeeping coach. ==Honours== ===Player=== ;Jiul Petroșani *Romanian Cup (1): 1973–74 *Romanian Second League (1): 1985–86 ;Dinamo București *Romanian League (3): 1981–82, 1982–83, 1983–84 *Romanian Cup (2): 1981–82, 1983–84 ===Manager=== ;Samsunspor *Balkans Cup (1): 1993–94 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Romania international footballers Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:AFC Rocar București players Category:Romanian football managers Category:FC Universitatea Cluj managers Category:CSM Jiul Petroșani managers Category:FC Politehnica Timișoara managers Category:FC Dinamo București players Category:CSM Jiul Petroșani players Category:FC UTA Arad players Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Turkey Category:Süper Lig managers Category:Samsunspor managers Category:MKE Ankaragücü managers Category:Adanaspor managers Category:Kayserispor managers Category:Gaziantepspor managers Category:FC Dinamo București managers Category:ACS Dacia Unirea Brăila managers Category:FC Astra Giurgiu managers Category:SR Brașov managers Category:FC Vaslui managers Category:Romanian expatriate football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in Turkey Category:Expatriate football managers in Saudi Arabia Category:Al-Taawoun FC managers Category:CSM Ceahlăul Piatra Neamț managers Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești managers Category:FC Sportul Studențesc București managers Category:FC Progresul București managers Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș managers Category:Ettifaq FC managers Category:FC Voluntari managers Category:CS Universitatea Craiova managers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Gheorghe Mulțescu
